website_summaries.verdict: The WD checks the boxes on everything you'd want in a portable storage drive, and with a stylish multiple color option, it's a easy recommendation.
pros: The new and compact My Passport Ultra portable drive offers up to 3TB of storage space, delivers fast performance and comes in many color options
The drive works right out of the box, features hardware encryption and includes helpful backup software
cons: The WD Backup software can't backup the entire system as an image and won't backup based on changes in real time
The new drive's performance, though quite fast, was a bit slower than the previous version

customer_reviews.title: Use for Xbox One, WORKS GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my Xbox One, had just paid off my preorders for Rise of the Tomb Raider and AC: Syndicate, and was already with only 40GB left on my 400GB console. So I researched and researched to find the right one. I found this one and was willing to take the chance. IT WAS SO EASY, just plugged it in, formatted it, and I was good to go. Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Jerin

customer_reviews.title: Negative Stars!
customer_reviews.text: always very satisfied with WD! **UPDATE** I bought this on Feb 5 of this year and it has stopped working! Originally I gave it 5 stars but now it has dropped to 1. I would not give it that if I had a choice. I bought one last year and it is still working, but now I am looking at a different brand and a larger size before I loose any more information that I have stored on my old one. It is bad enough that I have lost the info on the newer one! Very dissatisfied with this!
customer_reviews.author: Raven B.

customer_reviews.title: Convenient size
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this little portable Passport 2TB! This is very small yet very sturdy-feeling. Connects easily via USB to my computer and transferring files to and from is simple as can be. The light on the side is very bright and lets you know it's actively transferring files. There are little nubs/feet on the bottom. Comes with a USB 3.0 cord for transferring files that is compatible with USB 2.0. When using the 3.0, files are moved pretty fast. Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: this has stood up well to my moves and last better than any portable hard drive I've had to date
customer_reviews.text: I bought this just under a year ago for my research, as I would be traveling and taking videos - large files that needed lots of backup. Despite getting bumped around in my bag a fair bit, this has stood up well to my moves and last better than any portable hard drive I've had to date. The small physical size makes it easy to travel with, which is a huge plus for me, and the large storage capacity meant I could take reminders of home while also saving my research. All in all, a good product at a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was fine until it stopped working--RAID issue
customer_reviews.text: At first, this item was great--easy to set up. Right before I left for vacation, I started getting an error message that the RAID drive doesn't work. I ran all the diagnostics, but kept getting the message. I couldn't figure out how to contact the seller (and still can't). t'm back, and want to return it, but now it's been more than the 30 days. Total waste of $90, plus I have to buy another one to back up my computer. Is there a way I can exchange this, or am I stuck?
customer_reviews.author: Rarely Review

customer_reviews.title: Broke in one month.
customer_reviews.text: My WD Passport worked for one month before it broke. I tried plugging it into my computer one day and my computer did not recognize the drive. I downloaded WD Drive Utilities and tried to run some tests: they failed. I tried plugging in the Passport to other computers and none of the computers could recognize the drive.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Great price compared to the store
customer_reviews.text: Great price compared to the store, and works perfectly. Haven't had a problem with it since I got it. Used this to back up old hard drives from laptops that stopped working years ago and have had no problems with losing my pictures or anything else. I also used this to back up my current laptop and phones with 15,000+ pictures. Never have a problem with WD passports. Only brand I trust at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Rai K

customer_reviews.title: Buy it for yourself
customer_reviews.text: Added this to my router via the USB 2.0 port and it works great. I've bought WD passports before and was very happy, so I decided to try it again. I also have the Seagate equivalent 2tb, but that's starting to fail much sooner than my oldest Western Digital Passport. This is basically a plug and play external HDD. I think it maxes out at 5400rpm. I use it to store movies, song s, AND game install backups. I moved about 60gb in about 2 hour s. Not bad, became very hot to the touch but still works.
customer_reviews.author: L11

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great on XboxOne until it was about 50% full
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in August of 2016. 2 and a half years later the drive in giving out on me. Games I have downloaded on it wont run. They crash shortly after opening. If I move the game to my internal storage on my Xbox they run flawlessly. I wouldn't recommend this for gaming. Poor quality in the matter of product reliability and longevity.
customer_reviews.author: amitch14

customer_reviews.title: Drive did not work, never mounted in mac. Damaged unit?
customer_reviews.text: I just got this drive. For as much as I tried I could not make it work. I tried to mount it in my mac, it never showed up in the Disk Utility, I also tried the disk utility command line and it wasn't listed there either. I connect it, the light in the drive blinks and stays blinking forever. I restarted the computer (retina macbook pro 2015, OS X 10.11.3) and nothing. The cable was not the problem because I tried the cable that came with it with another external drive that I have and it (my old drive) showed up immediately. Maybe I simply had bad luck and received a damaged unit. Printing my return label now...
customer_reviews.author: SantaRom

customer_reviews.title: speed is i think little bit slow but quality is good. not overheating like seagete https
customer_reviews.text: For few days it works normall. speed is i think little bit slow but quality is good. not overheating like seagete  i think its beetter. i will write how it works after months again :))) Thanks WD :))
customer_reviews.author: G. B.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Mounting
customer_reviews.text: I hate this thing, it stopped having the ability to mount for more than a few minutes after about a year of use. I ve been making it work the best I can but it's unmounts on its own for no reason and it's super annoying. Im gonna trash it. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: loved it
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It is same as described. It has good life, strong and good quality. Received on time delivery.
customer_reviews.author: P. Srivastava

customer_reviews.title: I've had this for a few years and use it ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a few years and use it frequently for film school. It has proven durable, though the cable will need routine replacement.
customer_reviews.author: JS Ilm

customer_reviews.title: easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Works well, easy to set up. Does not have an option to automatically begin backing up when plugged in like most others. Will only backup according to time selected, needing to be continually plugged in. Have to open software and start backup manually each time you plug it in.
customer_reviews.author: Kz

customer_reviews.title: WD ftw!
customer_reviews.text: Have had 3 WD externals and they are all going strong still! I bought this one for my Mac and easily formatted it to work correctly. Looking forward to buying more WD's in the future!
customer_reviews.author: LucasMoore

customer_reviews.title: Great all around external drive; perfect for Xbox One users
customer_reviews.text: Use this as a secondary drive for my white Xbox One. This blends right in and I never notice it visually or functionally. I recommend this drive to any of my friends with an Xbox, and would also be a perfect external drive for general use as well.
customer_reviews.author: A. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Has common issues with data loss
customer_reviews.text: My product started blinking and the Mac wouldn't recognize it, I had to go through data recovery (not difficult but lengthy process), when I looked for solutions online it turns out it's a common issue with this product/brand. It's under warranty but I don't want the same problem going forward.
customer_reviews.author: CarlosL

customer_reviews.title: I can't really complain about this item. Having bought ...
customer_reviews.text: I can't really complain about this item. Having bought it after my computer's hard drive failed I needed a back up hard drive. I'll update this review as far as durability and long term use. The warranty that arrives with the product seems to cover most basic malfunctions.
customer_reviews.author: Ali E.

customer_reviews.title: nice!
customer_reviews.text: These external hard drive's have always worked well for me, they are recognized immediately by my computer, which is a Mac, and they just function.
customer_reviews.author: Hill1

customer_reviews.title: Great product, good price, quick delivery!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with the external hard drive. Now my files are backed up and in a fire-proof safe. Good price, easy to order and delivery was quick. I'm happy with the whole process and the product.
customer_reviews.author: Joel T.

customer_reviews.title: Working so far
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It's working. Hard to write a review on a hard drive because they usually do what they are supposed to until something goes wrong. So I always keep some extra backups. I use it to backup my Mac on Carbon Cloner every week.
customer_reviews.author: MaryL

customer_reviews.title: Using with my Xbox ONE
customer_reviews.text: The 2tb hard drive works very well, I've been using it with my Xbox ONE for about 3 months and there haven't been any issues. Formatting and installing with my Xbox was very simple, it was probably a 3-5 minute process. I'm very happy with my western digital hard drive. Product arrived about a week after purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Jay Massachusetts

customer_reviews.title: USB powered, and reliable
customer_reviews.text: My Passport is my go-to device for backing up my iMac. I have a My Book for my TimeMachine backups, but I use the portables for imaging, then storing that backup off-site. They've always been reliable and fast enough.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: I've used it for years.
customer_reviews.text: Still going strong. Very cheap junk storage saver for me.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Nickel

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient for carrying around
customer_reviews.text: I like this very much. This external hard drive is very convenient for carrying around and it does not require to plug in power separately.
customer_reviews.author: KevinYu

customer_reviews.title: Common problem, difficult fix
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about six months, until my MacBook stopped being able to read the drive. I was told it was a common problem with the drive not getting enough power, but despite going back and forth with WD for the last six months nothing has been resolved. Go for the wireless version, and go to Seagate for better customer support.
customer_reviews.author: ASG

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Works well for backup. You can use WD's backup programs or just manually transfer information to the hard disk. Satisfied with purchase.

customer_reviews.title: The best external hard drive I've ever had.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hard drive. I'm a graphic designer and have so much data - it's nice to be able to easily take my hard drive with me when I go out. It runs off of your computer - which is perfect for when you are out and about.
customer_reviews.author: Bridie Macdonald

customer_reviews.title: Works As Expected
customer_reviews.text: This is my third of these to buy. The first two were older models. It does exactl what I need it to with no problems.

customer_reviews.title: WD products are very dependable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: WD products are very dependable and easy to use. Really enjoy the white & 2TB of storage. Compact and easy to transport.

Of course, being a mechanical device, we'll see how it goes as time develops. Hoping for the best... it's a lovely little unit. So far, so good. And in the past I've had good luck with WD units, so we'll see if they're gonna keep on track!

customer_reviews.title: Drive shoes blank
customer_reviews.text: I don't tend to write reviews but this time I will. I've had this hard drive for less than a year and a few months ago I noticed that Time Machine couldn't do backups. I noticed that more often than not, I couldn't see what was in the drive. I reset it and put all my photos there, and when I tried to work on them with Lightroom, the software started to give me errors that I'd never seen before: problem reading the catalog file. Then again, I went in the drive and it would show empty. I definitely can't recommend this purchase and I'll be shopping around for a different brand.

This product was suggested by my network guy and then I read another recent item that also recommended this as it's number 2 choice, The number one choice was more than 3 times the cost of this device. Nice package with a grippy back that aids in keeping it secure on a shelf or even on top of your desk to computer tower.

product_meta.title: WD 2TB White My Passport Ultra Portable External Hard Drive - USB 3.0 - WDBBKD0020BWT-NESN
product_meta.description: Secure and dependable, My Passport Ultra can be trusted to safeguard your private files. Set an optional password, that only you know, to activate 256-bit hardware encryption to add an extra layer of security. Combined with WD Backup, our most powerful backup software yet, it's easier than ever to have a backup plan that fits your life.
feature_bullets: Secure portable storage with up to 3 TB capacity
Formatted for Windows; For Mac compatibility this Hard Drive requires reformatting; Refer to Application Guide for guidance on this
Automatic local and cloud backup; Stylish design with a range of exciting colors
Formatted for Windows. For Mac compatibility this Hard Drive requires reformatting. Refer to Application Guide for guidance on this

specifications.Operating System: Formatted for Windows. For Mac compatibility this Hard Drive requires reformatting
